Before 6-month intervention , insulin sensitivity ( via hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp ) , maximum aerobic capacity ( via respiratory gas exchange cardiopulmonary fitness measure ) , body fat composition ( via DEXA scan ) distribution ( via CT scan ) assess subject .
